channel.title: Web on Küse's Codes
channel.description: Recent content in Web on Küse's Codes

item.title: Serving static pages locally
item.description: Running build-in tomcat server It is possible to deploy Jekyll sites locally, because OSX has a build-in Apache tomcat server. The local sites reside under ~/Sites.

item.title: RESTful API
item.description: This contains some thoughts how to implement RESTful APIs. Background tbd Best practices A search for RESTful API best practices reveals many sites:
